pageSetting.title: 贷款责任业绩分配日志

attribute.value: select dm.dmz as key,dm.dmms as value from csb_dmms dm where dmmc='CXFS' order by xh

select.isEqual: select zh.khh,zh.zhhm,zh.zhdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (jl.zlbl) as fpgx,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq,czy.hymc as xgry, case when rz.czlx='01' then '新增'when rz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, f_timetochar(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz,zh.khrq from xtb_zhgxrz_dkzr rz inner join xtb_zhgxjl_dkzr jl on jl.jldh = rz.jldh inner join jxdx_dkzh zh on zh.jxdxdh = rz.jxdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join csb_dmms ms on lower(ms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=ms.dmz inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and zh.zhdh like '%$zh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh asc,jl.jldh asc,jl.ggbz asc

select zh.khh,zh.zhhm,zh.zhdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (jl.zlbl) as fpgx,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq,czy.hymc as xgry, case when rz.czlx='01' then '新增'when rz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, f_timetochar(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz,zh.khrq from xtb_zhgxrz_dkzr rz inner join xtb_zhgxjl_dkzr jl on jl.jldh = rz.jldh inner join jxdx_dkzh zh on zh.jxdxdh = rz.jxdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join csb_dmms ms on lower(ms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=ms.dmz inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and zh.zhdh like '%$zh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh asc,jl.jldh asc,jl.ggbz asc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select zh.khh,zh.zhhm,zh.zhdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (jl.zlbl) as fpgx,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq,czy.hymc as xgry, case when rz.czlx='01' then '新增'when rz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, f_timetochar(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz,zh.khrq from xtb_zhgxrz_dkzr rz inner join xtb_zhgxjl_dkzr jl on jl.jldh = rz.jldh inner join jxdx_dkzh zh on zh.jxdxdh = rz.jxdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join csb_dmms ms on lower(ms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=ms.dmz inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and zh.zhdh like '%$zh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh asc,jl.jldh asc,jl.ggbz asc
select zh.khh,zh.zhhm,zh.zhdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (jl.zlbl) as fpgx,jl.qsrq,jl.jsrq,czy.hymc as xgry, case when rz.czlx='01' then '新增'when rz.czlx='02' then '修改' else '删除' end as czlx, f_timetochar(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz,zh.khrq from xtb_zhgxrz_dkzr rz inner join xtb_zhgxjl_dkzr jl on jl.jldh = rz.jldh inner join jxdx_dkzh zh on zh.jxdxdh = rz.jxdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $jsrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and jg.zxrq>=$jsrq$ inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join csb_dmms ms on lower(ms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=ms.dmz inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh = $khdxdh$ and rz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) and zh.zhdh like '%$zh$%' order by rz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh asc,jl.jldh asc,jl.ggbz asc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dm.dmz as key,dm.dmms as value from csb_dmms dm where dmmc='CXFS' order by xh
